text: Members are entitled to comprehensive medical coverage including hospitalization, surgery, emergency care, and chronic condition management. Preauthorization is required for certain high-cost procedures.
Your health plan includes preventive checkups, immunizations, and access to a 24/7 telehealth hotline. Specialist referrals may be needed depending on your network tier.
Stay healthy with our extended health coverage—now with mental wellness benefits, discounted gym memberships, and zero-dollar copays for annual exams.
Coverage under this plan applies to accidental drops, cracked screens, and battery failures occurring beyond manufacturer warranty. Claims must be filed within 30 days of the incident.
Dropped your phone? No problem. File a claim online and receive a replacement within 48 hours with our rapid-response device protection plan.
This wireless protection plan includes coverage for loss, theft, liquid damage, and mechanical breakdowns, subject to a deductible and a maximum of two claims per rolling year.
Condo policies cover your unit's interior walls, floors, and personal belongings against perils such as fire, vandalism, and accidental water damage.
This HO-6 condo insurance plan extends liability protection to visitors injured inside your unit and pays for temporary housing if your home becomes uninhabitable.
We protect what your condo association doesn't: custom cabinetry, electronics, furniture, and more—plus coverage for legal expenses if someone sues you.
Umbrella insurance provides an extra $1–5 million in liability coverage once your home and auto policy limits are exhausted. Ideal for high-net-worth individuals.
Need more peace of mind? Our umbrella policy kicks in when your regular coverage isn't enough—covering legal fees, judgments, and settlements.
This policy supplements existing insurance, covering personal injury claims, landlord liability, and international incidents not typically handled by base policies.
Business travelers are protected against trip interruptions, emergency medical costs, and lost corporate equipment under this specialized coverage.
This policy reimburses costs related to trip delays, cancelled meetings, and stolen documents. Coverage begins 12 hours before scheduled departure.
Travel globally with confidence—our business coverage includes emergency evacuations, missed connections, and laptop loss due to theft.
Insures luxury wristwatches against theft, accidental damage, and mysterious disappearance. Appraisal documentation is required upon enrollment.
Your timepiece deserves protection. This policy offers worldwide coverage, zero depreciation on replacements, and optional rider for rare or vintage models.
Watch insurance you can trust—comprehensive plans for Rolex, Omega, and other high-end brands. Includes repair coverage and overnight replacements.
This whole life policy accumulates cash value and guarantees a tax-free death benefit for your beneficiaries. Premiums are fixed for the duration of the policy.
Term life insurance provides pure protection for 10, 20, or 30 years with guaranteed payout if death occurs during the term. Convertible options available.
Secure your loved ones' future. Our life insurance packages come with accelerated death benefits and rider options for accidental death or chronic illness.
Includes 100% coverage for cleanings and checkups, 80% for fillings and basic procedures, and 50% for crowns and bridges. Annual limits and waiting periods apply.
Dental plan covers preventive care twice annually and major procedures after a 6-month waiting period. Orthodontics coverage available as an add-on.
Brighten your smile—our dental insurance offers zero-dollar cleanings, fast claims processing, and network access to thousands of providers.
Short-term disability insurance covers 60% of your income for up to 6 months in the event of injury or illness. Benefits begin after a 14-day waiting period.
This policy protects your paycheck. Whether you're recovering from surgery or managing chronic illness, we help you stay financially secure.
Disability benefits kick in after 30 days and continue as long as you remain unable to work, up to the benefit duration selected in your plan.
Vision plan benefits include exams, lenses, and frames every 12 months. LASIK surgery discounts also available through affiliated providers.
Enjoy crystal-clear coverage—this plan gives you $150 toward glasses or contacts, plus free annual eye exams at in-network clinics.
Routine eye care just got easier. Our plan includes low copays for exams and coverage for bifocal, trifocal, and progressive lenses.
